p.k: To escape a monster, the girls have to tell him a scary story. / When Bubbles blames a string of accidents on her imaginary friend "Bliss," her sisters begin to think she's lost her mind. / The Girls learn Bliss' backstory from the Professor, Mojo Jojo and Bliss herself. / The Girls hang out with their new big sister Bliss, who gets a taste of fighting bad guys as part of the Powerpuff Girls.
